revised_title: Lord Walpole's Case: The Effectiveness of Soap and Lime-Water in Treating Kidney Stones
tldr: This article discusses the case of Lord Walpole, who suffered from kidney stones. It examines the effectiveness of soap and lime-water treatment in relieving his symptoms and preventing the stones from growing larger. The author argues that the treatment not only alleviated Lord Walpole's pain but also prevented the stones from increasing in size.
